title: Norrona Logo - Display Sans
content:
Hi there I would love to know if this is a purchasable font or a custom drawn.

Many thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414130502im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Norrona_Logo_2005_3594.jpg)
author: doj

comments.content:
Custom by Ole Sletten and Levi Bergqvist for Norrøna - [http://www.norrona.com/en-GB/About-Norrona/History-of-Norrona](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414130502/http:/www.norrona.com/en-GB/About-Norrona/History-of-Norrona "http://www.norrona.com/en-GB/About-Norrona/History-of-Norrona")

> A new graphic profile designed by Ole Sletten and Levi Bergqvist is launched in the summer 2005.

Alternatives: [Abald A](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414130502/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/storm/abalda), [Kumla](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414130502/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/autodidakt/kumla), [Deux Chasses](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414130502/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/deux-chasses-nf)
